import React, { Component } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidV4 } from 'uuid' class Register extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) console.log(props); this.state = { toggle: props.hide, pseudo: '', password: '', passwordConfirm: '' } } handleChangeInputPseudo = async event => { function validity(value) { const x = value.textLength switch (true) { case (x < 3): return "Pseudo trop court" case (x > 32): return "Pseudo trop long" default: return true } } console.log(validity(event.target)) const pseudo = event.target.value this.setState({ pseudo }) } handleCreateUser = () => { this.props.onIdSubmit(uuidV4()) } render() { const { pseudo, password, passwordConfirm } = this.state console.log(this) return (
FInt.Tchat
Bienvenue dans l'espace d'inscription
Pseudo
Mot de passe
Confirmer le mot de passe
) } } export default Register
